resources.string: An error occurred, please try again
The free service is busy, try again in a few seconds

The language model needs to be downloaded to continue. This download is large and may take up to 10 minutes with a WIFI connection, but you only need to do it once unless you delete it. Make sure you have enough space. You can use other apps while downloading as long as you don\'t stop the process
This is necessary to activate the chat brain, it will take a few seconds and use a lot of your device\'s memory.
It seems the model is incomplete. It may still be downloading, check your device\'s status bar, but if not, try downloading it again.
Verify that you have available space, stable wifi, and try again.
This may take a few seconds, please wait
The model is downloaded to your device and works offline but may be slow, uses a lot of memory, and only works with medium or high-end devices
Works through the internet, requires connection and is subject to availability and traffic as free or low-cost servers are used.
You can change this later in settings
Not enough space. Free up the required space and try again.
All set to translate with the online service
All set to translate without using connection
Report this translation only if it resulted in something offensive or dangerous. This report is not for reporting translation errors or general errors.
The report has been sent for analysis
We detected that your device is high-end and will produce up to 40 words per minute or more
We detected that your device is mid-range and will produce around 15 words per minute
We detected that your device is low-end and will produce up to 5 words per minute or less
Starting up, wait a few seconds
